text:
Are people pushing this out on servers too? The MSRC article indicates that
Server 2016 and newer are affected, but all of the chatter has been around
Windows 10 from what I have seen. 
Thanks 
Jeff Brown

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
